All Classes

Class Description
AddToWalletAction
Special PickUpItemAction that allows an actor to add coin items to wallet.
Application
The main class for the Mario World edu.monash.fit2099.game.
AttackAction
Special Action for attacking other Actors.
AttackBehaviour
Behaviour class that represents an attack behaviour of the actor
Behaviour
Interface for classes that are behaviours.
Coin
This class represents the Coin objects in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
ConsumableItem
Interface for Consumable items
ConsumeAction
Special PickUpItemAction that allows an actor to consume consumable items.
DestroyGroundAction
Special DestroyGroundAction that allows an actor to destroy any ground to dirt.
DestroyShellAction
Special DestroyShellAction that allows an actor to destroy the shell of a Koopa.
Dirt
A class that represents bare dirt.
DormantAction
Special Action that allows an actor to become dormant
Enemy
Abstract class that represents an Enemy to the Actor
FadeableItem
Interface for Fadeable items
Floor
A class that represents the floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
GetRemovedAction
Special Action for removing/killing actors instantly
Goomba
A little fungus guy.
HigherGround
This interface handles the interaction player has with higher grounds in the map of the edu.monash.fit2099.game
InstaKilledAction
Special InstaKilledAction that allows an actor to instantly kill its opponents.
JumpAction
This class handles the 'jump' functionality of the actor in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
Koopa
Class that represents a Koopa (like a turtle), who is an enemy to the player.
Mature
The Sprout class represents the first third and final cycle stage and handles all the functionalities,the actor has with mature
Player
Class representing the Player.
PowerStar
This class represents the PowerStar objects in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
ResetGameAction
Special ResetGameAction that allows an actor to reset the edu.monash.fit2099.game.
ResetManager
A global Singleton manager that does soft-reset on the instances.
Resettable
Interface for Resettable items
Sapling
The Sapling class represents the second tree cycle stage and handles all the functionalities,the actor has with sapling
Sprout
The Sprout class represents the first tree cycle stage and handles all the functionalities,the actor has with sprout
Status
Enum class to give `buff` or `debuff`.
SuperMushroom
This class represents the SuperMushroom objects in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
TalkWithToadAction
Special TalkWithToadAction that allows an actor to talk with Toad.
Toad
A global Singleton class representing the Toad.
Tradeable
Interface for Tradeable items
TradeAction
Special TradeActopm that allows an actor to trade items with Toad.
Tree
An abstract class representing a Tree in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
Utils
This class represents a utility class which essentially generates a random number which is used to account for probability in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
Wall
Class representing a Wall
Wallet
This class represents the Wallet objects in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
WanderBehaviour
A class that figures out an Action that will allow the actor to wander around the map.
Wrench
This class represents the Wrench weapon in the edu.monash.fit2099.game
